title: MC intersects ATC, AVC at minimums

content.question: Which of the following is true of the marginal cost curve?

choices.label: It intersects the average variable cost curve and the average total cost curve at each curve’s minimum point.
It intersects the average variable cost curve and the average fixed cost curve at each curve’s minimum point.
It lies between the total cost curve and the total variable cost curve.
It increases initially, for a time, but begins to decline when the point of diminishing returns is reached.
It decreases, because average variable cost is less than marginal cost.

content.answer: It intersects the average variable cost curve and the average total cost curve at each curve’s minimum point.
